" Well , [Mr. Almayer]139-mr. almayer , will [you]139-mr. almayer answer [my]1882-the lieutenant question as frankly as it is put to [you]139-mr. almayer ? "[1882-the lieutenant] asked [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant , after a long silence . [Almayer]72-almayer turned round and looked at [[his]95-ali interlocutor]1900-his interlocutor steadily . " If [you]1873-the officer catch [this Dain]2638-this dain what will [you]1873-the officer do with [him]2638-this dain ? "[95-ali] [he]95-ali asked . [The officer]1873-the officer 's face flushed . " This is not an answer , "[1873-the officer] [he]1873-the officer said , annoyed . " And what will [you]1873-the officer do with [me]72-almayer ? "[72-almayer] went on [Almayer]72-almayer , not heeding the interruption . " Are [you]139-mr. almayer inclined to bargain ? "[343-the other] growled [the other]343-the other . " It would be bad policy , [I]343-the other assure [you]139-mr. almayer . At present [I]343-the other have no orders about [[your]139-mr. almayer person]2982-your person , but [we]2983-we expected [your]139-mr. almayer assistance in catching [this Malay]2984-this malay . "[343-the other] " Ah ! "[72-almayer] interrupted [Almayer]72-almayer , " just so : [you]1873-the officer can do nothing without [me]72-almayer , and [I]72-almayer , knowing [the man]726-the man well , am to help [you]1873-the officer in finding [him]726-the man . "[72-almayer] " This is exactly what [we]2983-we expect , "[1873-the officer] assented [the officer]1873-the officer . " [You]139-mr. almayer have broken the law , [Mr. Almayer]139-mr. almayer , and [you]139-mr. almayer ought to make amends . "[1873-the officer] " And save [myself]72-almayer ? "[72-almayer] " Well , in a sense yes . [Your]139-mr. almayer head is not in any danger , "[1882-the lieutenant] said [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant , with a short laugh . " Very well , "[72-almayer] said [Almayer]72-almayer , with decision , " [I]72-almayer shall deliver [the man]726-the man up to [you]1873-the officer . "[72-almayer] [Both officers]1886-both officers rose to [their]1886-both officers feet quickly , and looked for [their]1886-both officers side - arms which [they]1886-both officers had unbuckled . [Almayer]72-almayer laughed harshly . " Steady , [gentlemen]2956-gentlemen ! "[1906-my] [he]1906-my exclaimed . " In [my]1906-my own time and in [my]1906-my own way . After dinner , [gentlemen]2956-gentlemen , [you]2956-gentlemen shall have [him]726-the man . "[1906-my] " This is preposterous , "[1882-the lieutenant] urged [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant . " [Mr. Almayer]139-mr. almayer , this is no joking matter . [The man]726-the man is [a criminal]2990-a criminal . [He]726-the man deserves to hang . " [I]72-almayer give [you]2956-gentlemen [my]72-almayer word of honour , [gentlemen]2956-gentlemen , that [he]726-the man shall not escape ; [I]72-almayer have [him]726-the man safe enough . "[72-almayer] " The arrest should be effected before dark , "[1908-the young sub] remarked [the young sub]1908-the young sub . " [I]1879-the senior shall hold [you]72-almayer responsible for any failure . [Almayer]72-almayer made a gesture of assent . " On [my]1910-he word of honour , "[1910-he] [he]1910-he repeated vaguely . " And now let [us]1886-both officers dine , "[1910-he] [he]1910-he added briskly . [Nina]73-nina came through the doorway and stood for a moment holding the curtain aside for [Ali]95-ali and [the old Malay woman bearing the dishes]1911-the old malay woman bearing the dishes ; then [she]73-nina moved towards [the three men by the table]1912-the three men by the table . " Allow [me]72-almayer , "[72-almayer] said [Almayer]72-almayer , pompously . " This is [[my]72-almayer daughter]2594-my daughter . "[72-almayer] [Nina]73-nina answered the low bows of [the two officers]1913-the two officers by a slow inclination of the head and took [her]73-nina place at the table opposite [[her]73-nina father]408-her father . [All]1915-all sat down . [The coxswain of the steam launch]1916-the coxswain of the steam launch came up carrying some bottles of wine . " [You]72-almayer will allow [me]1882-the lieutenant to have this put upon the table ? "[1882-the lieutenant] said [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant to [Almayer]72-almayer . " What ! Wine ! [You]72-almayer are very kind . Certainly , [I]1882-the lieutenant have [none]1763-none [myself]1882-the lieutenant . Times are very hard . "[1882-the lieutenant] The last words of [his]1882-the lieutenant reply were spoken by [Almayer]72-almayer in a faltering voice . The thought that [Dain]74-dain was dead recurred to [him]408-her father vividly again , and [he]408-her father felt as if an invisible hand was gripping [his]408-her father throat . [He]408-her father reached for the gin bottle while [they]1918-they were uncorking the wine and swallowed a big gulp . [The lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant , who was speaking to [Nina]73-nina , gave [him]408-her father a quick glance . [The young sub]1908-the young sub began to recover from the astonishment and confusion caused by [Nina]73-nina 's unexpected appearance and great beauty . " [She]73-nina was very beautiful and imposing , "[408-her father] [he]408-her father reflected , " but after all [a half - caste girl]2996-a half - caste girl . "[408-her father] This thought caused [him]408-her father to pluck up heart and look at [Nina]73-nina sideways . [Nina]73-nina , with composed face , was answering in a low , even voice [the elder officer]1921-the elder officer 's polite questions as to [the country]1922-the country and [her]73-nina mode of life . [Almayer]72-almayer pushed [his]408-her father plate away and drank [[his]408-her father guest]1013-his guest 's wine in gloomy silence . [CHAPTER IX]140-chapter ix . " Can [I]140-chapter ix believe what [you]103-babalatchi tell [me]140-chapter ix ? It is like a tale for [men that listen only half awake by the camp fire]2997-men that listen only half awake by the camp fire , and it seems to have run off [a woman]613-a woman 's tongue . "[140-chapter ix] " Who is there here for [me]103-babalatchi to deceive , [O Rajah]123-the rajah ? "[103-babalatchi] answered [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " Without [you]103-babalatchi [I]103-babalatchi am nothing . All [I]103-babalatchi have told [you]103-babalatchi [I]103-babalatchi believe to be true . [I]103-babalatchi have been safe for many years in the hollow of [your]103-babalatchi hand . This is no time to harbour suspicions . The danger is very great . [We]1924-they should advise and act at once , before the sun sets . "[103-babalatchi] " Right . Right , "[85-lakamba] muttered [Lakamba]85-lakamba , pensively . [They]1924-they had been sitting for the last hour together in [the audience chamber of [the Rajah]123-the rajah 's house]1925-the audience chamber of the rajah 's house , for [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , as soon as [he]103-babalatchi had witnessed the landing of [the Dutch officers]728-the dutch officers , had crossed [the river]170-the river to report to [[his]103-babalatchi master]1119-his master the events of the morning , and to confer with [him]1119-his master upon the line of conduct to pursue in the face of altered circumstances . [They]1924-they were both puzzled and frightened by the unexpected turn the events had taken . [The Rajah]123-the rajah , sitting crosslegged on [his]123-the rajah chair , looked fixedly at the floor ; [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi was squatting close by in an attitude of deep dejection . " And where did [you]85-lakamba say [he]123-the rajah is hiding now ? "[85-lakamba] asked [Lakamba]85-lakamba , breaking at last the silence full of gloomy forebodings in which [they]1924-they both had been lost for a long while . " In [Bulangi 's clearing]102-bulangi - [the furthest one , away from [the house]169-the house]2999-the furthest one , away from the house . [They]1924-they went [there]2669-there that very night . [[The white man]512-the white man 's daughter]2813-the white man 's daughter took [him]123-the rajah [there]2669-there . [She]2813-the white man 's daughter told [me]1929-me so [herself]2813-the white man 's daughter , speaking to [me]1929-me openly , for [she]2813-the white man 's daughter is half white and has no decency . [She]2813-the white man 's daughter said [she]2813-the white man 's daughter was waiting for [him]123-the rajah while [he]123-the rajah was [here]2634-here ; then , after a long time , [he]123-the rajah came out of the darkness and fell at [her]2813-the white man 's daughter feet exhausted . [He]123-the rajah lay like one dead , but [she]2813-the white man 's daughter brought [him]123-the rajah back to life in [her]2813-the white man 's daughter arms , and made [him]123-the rajah breathe again with [her]2813-the white man 's daughter own breath . That is what [she]2813-the white man 's daughter said , speaking to [my]1929-me face , as [I]1929-me am speaking now to [you]1929-me , [Rajah]123-the rajah . [She]2813-the white man 's daughter is like [a white woman]3006-a white woman and knows no shame . "[1929-me] [He]1929-me paused , deeply shocked . [Lakamba]85-lakamba nodded [his]85-lakamba head . " Well , and then ? "[85-lakamba] [he]85-lakamba asked . " [They]3007-they called [the old woman]861-the old woman , "[103-babalatchi] went on [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , " and [he]123-the rajah told [them]3007-they all - about [the brig]288-the brig , and how [he]123-the rajah tried to kill [many men]3010-many men . [He]123-the rajah knew [the Orang Blanda]125-the orang blanda were very near , although [he]123-the rajah had said nothing to [us]3007-they about that ; [he]123-the rajah knew [his]123-the rajah great danger . [He]123-the rajah thought [he]123-the rajah had killed many , but there were only two dead , as [I]103-babalatchi have heard from [the men of [the sea]171-the sea that came in [the warship]1844-the warship 's boats]3011-the men of the sea that came in the warship 's boats . "[103-babalatchi] " And [the other man]3014-the other man , [he]3014-the other man that was found in [the river]170-the river ? "[85-lakamba] interrupted [Lakamba]85-lakamba . " That was [one of [[his]123-the rajah boatmen]1440-his boatmen]3016-one of his boatmen . When [[his]123-the rajah canoe]1217-his canoe was overturned by the logs [those two]3019-those two swam together , but [the other man]3014-the other man must have been hurt . [Dain]74-dain swam , holding [him]123-the rajah up . [He]74-dain left [him]123-the rajah in the bushes when [he]74-dain went up to [the house]169-the house . When [they]3019-those two all came down [his]74-dain heart had ceased to beat ; then [the old woman]861-the old woman spoke ; [Dain]74-dain thought it was good . [He]74-dain took off [his]74-dain anklet and broke it , twisting it round [the man]726-the man 's foot . [His]74-dain ring [he]74-dain put on [that slave]3024-that slave 's hand . [He]74-dain took off [his]74-dain sarong and clothed that thing that wanted no clothes , [the two women]1007-the two women holding it up meanwhile , [their]1007-the two women intent being to deceive all eyes and to mislead [the minds in [the settlement]523-the settlement]3026-the minds in the settlement , so that [they]1007-the two women could swear to the thing that was not , and that there could be no treachery when [the white - men]3028-the white - men came . Then [Dain]74-dain and [the white woman]1818-the white woman departed to call up [Bulangi]102-bulangi and find a hiding - place . [The old woman]861-the old woman remained by the body . "[85-lakamba] " Hai ! "[85-lakamba] exclaimed [Lakamba]85-lakamba . " [She]861-the old woman has wisdom . "[85-lakamba] " Yes , [she]861-the old woman has [a Devil of [her]861-the old woman own]3031-a devil of her own to whisper counsel in [her]861-the old woman ear , "[103-babalatchi] assented [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " [She]861-the old woman dragged the body with great toil to the point where many logs were stranded . All these things were done in the darkness after the storm had passed away . Then [she]861-the old woman waited . At the first sign of daylight [she]861-the old woman battered the face of the dead with a heavy stone , and [she]861-the old woman pushed [him]74-dain amongst the logs . [She]861-the old woman remained near , watching . At sunrise [Mahmat Banjer]132-mahmat came and found [him]74-dain . [They]3028-the white - men all believed ; [I]103-babalatchi [myself]103-babalatchi was deceived , but not for long . [The white man]512-the white man believed , and , grieving , fled to [[his]512-the white man house]372-his house . When [we]3034-we were alone [I]103-babalatchi , having doubts , spoke to [the woman]2854-the woman , and [she]2854-the woman , fearing [my]103-babalatchi anger and [your]103-babalatchi might , told [me]103-babalatchi all , asking for help in saving [Dain]74-dain . "[103-babalatchi] " [He]74-dain must not fall into the hands of [the Orang Blanda]125-the orang blanda , "[85-lakamba] said [Lakamba]85-lakamba ; " but let [him]74-dain die , if the thing can be done quietly . "[85-lakamba] " It can not , [Tuan]103-babalatchi ! Remember there is [that woman who , being half white , is ungovernable , and would raise a great outcry]3036-that woman who , being half white , is ungovernable , and would raise a great outcry . Also [the officers]2896-the officers are here . [They]2896-the officers are angry enough already . [Dain]74-dain must escape ; [he]74-dain must go . [We]3034-we must help [him]74-dain now for [our]3034-we own safety . "[103-babalatchi] " Are [the officers]2896-the officers very angry ? "[85-lakamba] inquired [Lakamba]85-lakamba , with interest . " [They]2896-the officers are . [The principal chief]3039-the principal chief used strong words when speaking to [me]103-babalatchi - to [me]103-babalatchi when [I]103-babalatchi salaamed in [your]103-babalatchi name . [I]103-babalatchi do not think , "[103-babalatchi] added [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , after a short pause and looking very worried - " [I]103-babalatchi do not think [I]103-babalatchi saw [a white chief]3040-a white chief so angry before . [He]3040-a white chief said [we]3034-we were careless or even worse . [He]3040-a white chief told [me]103-babalatchi [he]3040-a white chief would speak to [the Rajah]656-the rajah , and that [I]103-babalatchi was of no account . "[103-babalatchi] " Speak to [the Rajah]123-the rajah ! "[85-lakamba] repeated [Lakamba]85-lakamba , thoughtfully . " Listen , [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi : [I]103-babalatchi am sick , and shall withdraw ; [you]103-babalatchi cross over and tell [the white men]2919-the white men . "[103-babalatchi] " Yes , "[103-babalatchi] said [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , " [I]103-babalatchi am going over at once ; and as to [Dain]74-dain ? "[103-babalatchi] " [You]103-babalatchi get [him]74-dain away as [you]103-babalatchi can best . This is a great trouble in [my]85-lakamba heart , "[85-lakamba] sighed [Lakamba]85-lakamba . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi got up , and , going close to [[his]103-babalatchi master]1119-his master , spoke earnestly . " There is one of [[our]3043-our praus at [the southern mouth of [the river]170-the river]3045-the southern mouth of the river]3044-our praus at the southern mouth of the river . [The Dutch warship]3047-the dutch warship is to the northward watching the main entrance . [I]103-babalatchi shall send [Dain]74-dain off to - night in [a canoe]2884-a canoe , by [the hidden channels]3049-the hidden channels , on board [the prau]433-the prau . [[His]74-dain father]177-his father is [a great prince]1409-a great prince , and shall hear of [our]3043-our generosity . Let [the prau]433-the prau take [him]74-dain to [Ampanam]56-ampanam . [Your]74-dain glory shall be great , and [your]74-dain reward in powerful friendship . [Almayer]72-almayer will no doubt deliver the dead body as [Dain]74-dain 's to [the officers]2896-the officers , and [the foolish white men]3055-the foolish white men shall say , ' This is very good ; let there be peace . ' And the trouble shall be removed from [your]74-dain heart , [Rajah]123-the rajah . "[103-babalatchi] " True ! true ! "[85-lakamba] said [Lakamba]85-lakamba . " And , this being accomplished by [me]85-lakamba who am [[your]74-dain slave]3056-your slave , [you]74-dain shall reward with a generous hand . That [I]85-lakamba know ! [The white man]512-the white man is grieving for the lost treasure , in the manner of [white men who thirst after dollars]3058-white men who thirst after dollars . Now , when all other things are in order , [we]3059-we shall perhaps obtain the treasure from [the white man]512-the white man . [Dain]74-dain must escape , and [Almayer]72-almayer must live . "[85-lakamba] " Now go , [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , go ! "[85-lakamba] said [Lakamba]85-lakamba , getting off [his]85-lakamba chair . " [I]85-lakamba am very sick , and want medicine . Tell [the white chief]3061-the white chief so . "[85-lakamba] But [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi was not to be got rid of in this summary manner . [He]103-babalatchi knew that [[his]103-babalatchi master]1119-his master , after the manner of [the great]1932-the great , liked to shift the burden of toil and danger on to [[his]1119-his master servants]1357-his servants ' shoulders , but in the difficult straits in which [they]1934-they were now [the Rajah]656-the rajah must play [his]656-the rajah part . [He]656-the rajah may be very sick for [the white men]2919-the white men , for all [the world]190-the world if [he]656-the rajah liked , as long as [he]656-the rajah would take upon [himself]656-the rajah the execution of part at least of [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi 's carefully thought - of plan . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi wanted [a big canoe]1938-a big canoe manned by [twelve men]1939-twelve men to be sent out after dark towards [[Bulangi]102-bulangi 's clearing]2852-bulangi 's clearing . [Dain]74-dain may have to be overpowered . [A man in love]1941-a man in love can not be expected to see clearly the path of safety if it leads [him]1941-a man in love away from the object of [his]1941-a man in love affections , argued [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , and in that case [they]1934-they would have to use force in order to make [him]656-the rajah go . Would [the Rajah]123-the rajah see that [trusty men]1942-trusty men manned [the canoe]338-the canoe ? The thing must be done secretly . Perhaps [the Rajah]656-the rajah would come [himself]656-the rajah , so as to bring all the weight of [his]656-the rajah authority to bear upon [Dain]74-dain if [he]656-the rajah should prove obstinate and refuse to leave [his]656-the rajah hiding - place . [The Rajah]123-the rajah would not commit [himself]123-the rajah to a definite promise , and anxiously pressed [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi to go , being afraid of [the white men]2919-the white men paying [him]103-babalatchi an unexpected visit . [The aged statesman]1555-the aged statesman reluctantly took [his]103-babalatchi leave and went into [the courtyard]988-the courtyard . Before going down to [[his]103-babalatchi boat]1948-his boat [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi stopped for a while in [the big open space where the thick - leaved trees]1949-the big open space where the thick - leaved trees put black patches of shadow which seemed to float on a flood of smooth , intense light that rolled up to [the houses]757-the houses and down to [the stockade]1322-the stockade and over [the river]170-the river , where it broke and sparkled in thousands of glittering wavelets , like a band woven of azure and gold edged with the brilliant green of the forests guarding [both banks of [the Pantai]3-the pantai]1953-both banks of the pantai . In the perfect calm before the coming of the afternoon breeze the irregularly jagged line of tree - tops stood unchanging , as if traced by an unsteady hand on the clear blue of the hot sky . In the space sheltered by the high palisades there lingered the smell of decaying blossoms from [the surrounding forest]1954-the surrounding forest , a taint of drying fish ; with now and then a whiff of acrid smoke from the cooking fires when it eddied down from under the leafy boughs and clung lazily about the burnt - up grass . As [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi looked up at the flagstaff over - topping a group of low trees in [the middle of [the courtyard]988-the courtyard]1955-the middle of the courtyard , the tricolour flag of [the Netherlands]1957-the netherlands stirred slightly for the first time since it had been hoisted that morning on the arrival of [the man - of - war boats]1958-the man - of - war boats . With a faint rustle of trees the breeze came down in light puffs , playing capriciously for a time with this emblem of [Lakamba]85-lakamba 's power , that was also the mark of [his]85-lakamba servitude ; then the breeze freshened in a sharp gust of wind , and the flag flew out straight and steady above the trees . A dark shadow ran along [the river]170-the river , rolling over and covering up the sparkle of declining sunlight . A big white cloud sailed slowly across the darkening sky , and hung to the westward as if waiting for the sun to join it there . [Men]304-men and things shook off the torpor of the hot afternoon and stirred into life under the first breath of the sea breeze . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi hurried down to the water - gate ; yet before [he]103-babalatchi passed through [it]1961-it [he]103-babalatchi paused to look round [the courtyard]988-the courtyard , with [its]988-the courtyard light and shade , with [its]988-the courtyard cheery fires , with [the groups of [[Lakamba]85-lakamba 's soldiers]1964-lakamba 's soldiers and [retainers]1439-retainers scattered about]1963-the groups of lakamba 's soldiers and retainers scattered about . [[His]103-babalatchi own house]1490-his own house stood amongst [the other buildings in that enclosure]1967-the other buildings in that enclosure , and [the statesman of [Sambir]123-the rajah]1085-the statesman of sambir asked [himself]1085-the statesman of sambir with a sinking heart when and how would it be given [him]1085-the statesman of sambir to return to [that house]1969-that house . [He]1085-the statesman of sambir had to deal with [a man more dangerous than any wild beast of [his]1085-the statesman of sambir experience]1970-a man more dangerous than any wild beast of his experience : [a proud man]1971-a proud man , [a man wilful after the manner of princes]1972-a man wilful after the manner of princes , [a man in love]1941-a man in love . And [he]1085-the statesman of sambir was going forth to speak to [that man]826-that man words of cold and worldly wisdom . Could anything be more appalling ? What if [that man]826-that man should take umbrage at some fancied slight to [his]826-that man honour or disregard of [his]826-that man affections and suddenly " amok "[1085-the statesman of sambir] ? [The wise adviser]1976-the wise adviser would be [the first victim]1977-the first victim , no doubt , and death would be [his]1976-the wise adviser reward . And underlying the horror of this situation there was the danger of [those meddlesome fools]1978-those meddlesome fools , [the white men]2919-the white men . A vision of comfortless exile in [far - off [Madura]57-madura]1980-far - off madura rose up before [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . Would n't that be worse than death itself ? And there was [that half - white woman with threatening eyes]1981-that half - white woman with threatening eyes . How could [he]103-babalatchi tell what [an incomprehensible creature of that sort]1982-an incomprehensible creature of that sort would or would not do ? [She]1981-that half - white woman with threatening eyes knew so much that [she]1981-that half - white woman with threatening eyes made the killing of [Dain]74-dain an impossibility . That much was certain . And yet [the sharp , rough - edged kriss]1983-the sharp , rough - edged kriss is [a good and discreet friend]1984-a good and discreet friend , thought [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , as [he]103-babalatchi examined [his]103-babalatchi own lovingly , and put it back in the sheath , with a sigh of regret , before unfastening [his]103-babalatchi canoe . As [he]103-babalatchi cast off the painter , pushed out into [the stream]1985-the stream , and took up [his]103-babalatchi paddle , [he]103-babalatchi realised vividly how unsatisfactory it was to have [women]631-women mixed up in state affairs . [Young women]1987-young women , of course . For [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer 's mature wisdom , and for the easy aptitude in intrigue that comes with years to the feminine mind , [he]103-babalatchi felt the most sincere respect . [He]103-babalatchi paddled leisurely , letting [the canoe]338-the canoe drift down as [he]103-babalatchi crossed towards [the point]1989-the point . The sun was high yet , and nothing pressed . [His]103-babalatchi work would commence only with the coming of darkness . Avoiding [the Lingard jetty]730-the lingard jetty , [he]103-babalatchi rounded [the point]1989-the point , and paddled up [the creek]941-the creek at the back of [[Almayer]72-almayer 's house]524-almayer 's house . There were many canoes lying there , [their]1994-their noses all drawn together , fastened all to the same stake . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi pushed [[his]103-babalatchi little craft]1995-his little craft in amongst [them]1994-their and stepped on [shore]1259-shore . On the other side of [the ditch]1845-the ditch something moved in the grass . " Who 's that hiding ? "[103-babalatchi] hailed [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " Come out and speak to [me]103-babalatchi . "[103-babalatchi] [Nobody]163-nobody answered . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi crossed over , passing from [boat]748-boat to [boat]748-boat , and poked [his]103-babalatchi staff viciously in the suspicious place . [Taminah]119-taminah jumped up with a cry . " What are [you]119-taminah doing here ? "[119-taminah] [he]119-taminah asked , surprised . " [I]119-taminah have nearly stepped on [your]119-taminah tray . Am [I]119-taminah a Dyak that [you]119-taminah should hide at [my]119-taminah sight ? "[119-taminah] " [I]119-taminah was weary , and - [I]119-taminah slept , "[119-taminah] whispered [Taminah]119-taminah , confusedly . " [You]119-taminah slept ! [You]119-taminah have not sold anything to - day , and [you]119-taminah will be beaten when [you]119-taminah return [home]243-home , "[103-babalatchi] said [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . [Taminah]119-taminah stood before [him]103-babalatchi abashed and silent . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi looked [her]2001-her over carefully with great satisfaction . Decidedly [he]103-babalatchi would offer fifty dollars more to [that thief Bulangi]2002-that thief bulangi . [The girl]402-the girl pleased [him]103-babalatchi . " Now [you]119-taminah go [home]243-home . It is late , "[103-babalatchi] [he]103-babalatchi said sharply . " Tell [Bulangi]102-bulangi that [I]103-babalatchi shall be near [[his]102-bulangi house]372-his house before the night is half over , and that [I]103-babalatchi want [him]102-bulangi to make all things ready for a long journey . [You]119-taminah understand ? A long journey to the southward . Tell [him]102-bulangi that before sunset , and do not forget [my]103-babalatchi words . "[103-babalatchi] [Taminah]119-taminah made a gesture of assent , and watched [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi recross the ditch and disappear through the bushes bordering [[Almayer]72-almayer 's compound]1086-almayer 's compound . [She]402-the girl moved a little further off [the creek]941-the creek and sank in the grass again , lying down on [her]402-the girl face , shivering in dry - eyed misery . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi walked straight towards [the cooking - shed]2006-the cooking - shed looking for [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer . [The courtyard]988-the courtyard was in a great uproar . [A strange Chinaman]2008-a strange chinaman had possession of the kitchen fire and was noisily demanding another saucepan . [He]2008-a strange chinaman hurled objurgations , in the [Canton]58-canton dialect and bad Malay , against the group of [slave - girls]2009-slave - girls standing a little way off , half frightened , half amused , at [his]2008-a strange chinaman violence . From the camping fires round which [the seamen of the frigate]1863-the seamen of the frigate were sitting came words of encouragement , mingled with laughter and jeering . In the midst of this noise and confusion [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi met [Ali]95-ali , an empty dish in [his]95-ali hand . " Where are [the white men]2919-the white men ? "[103-babalatchi] asked [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " [They]2919-the white men are eating in [the front verandah]1001-the front verandah , "[95-ali] answered [Ali]95-ali . " Do not stop [me]95-ali , [Tuan]103-babalatchi . [I]95-ali am giving [the white men]2919-the white men [their]2919-the white men food and am busy . "[95-ali] " Where 's [Mem Almayer]138-mem almayer ? "[103-babalatchi] " Inside in [the passage]1004-the passage . [She]138-mem almayer is listening to the talk . "[95-ali] [Ali]95-ali grinned and passed on ; [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi ascended the plankway to [the rear verandah]2011-the rear verandah , and beckoning out [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , engaged [her]72-almayer in earnest conversation . Through [the long passage]2012-the long passage , closed at the further end by the red curtain , [they]2013-we could hear from time to time [Almayer]72-almayer 's voice mingling in conversation with an abrupt loudness that made [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer look significantly at [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " Listen , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer said . " [He]103-babalatchi has drunk much . "[72-almayer] " [He]103-babalatchi has , "[103-babalatchi] whispered [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " [He]103-babalatchi will sleep heavily to - night . "[103-babalatchi] [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer looked doubtful . " Sometimes the devil of strong gin makes [him]103-babalatchi keep awake , and [he]103-babalatchi walks up and down [the verandah]156-the verandah all night , cursing ; then [we]2013-we stand afar off , "[72-almayer] explained [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , with the fuller knowledge born of twenty odd years of married life . " But then [he]103-babalatchi does not hear , nor understand , and [his]103-babalatchi hand , of course , has no strength . [We]2013-we do not want [him]103-babalatchi to hear to - night . "[72-almayer] " No , "[72-almayer] assented [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , energetically , but in a cautiously subdued voice . " If [he]103-babalatchi hears [he]103-babalatchi will kill . "[72-almayer] [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi looked incredulous . " [Hai Tuan]141-hai , [you]103-babalatchi may believe [me]72-almayer . Have [I]72-almayer not lived many years with [that man]826-that man ? Have [I]72-almayer not seen death in [that man]826-that man 's eyes more than once when [I]72-almayer was younger and [he]826-that man guessed at many things . Had [he]826-that man been [a man of [[my]72-almayer own people]2626-my own people]3072-a man of my own people [I]72-almayer would not have seen such a look twice ; but [he]826-that man - "[72-almayer] With a contemptuous gesture [she]72-almayer seemed to fling unutterable scorn on [Almayer]72-almayer 's weak - minded aversion to sudden bloodshed . " If [he]826-that man has the wish but not the strength , then what do [we]2014-we fear ? "[103-babalatchi] asked [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , after a short silence during which [they]2014-we both listened to [Almayer]72-almayer 's loud talk till it subsided into the murmur of general conversation . " What do [we]2014-we fear ? "[103-babalatchi] repeated [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi again . " To keep [the daughter whom [he]826-that man loves]3074-the daughter whom he loves [he]826-that man would strike into [your]72-almayer heart and [mine]72-almayer without hesitation , "[72-almayer] said [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer . " When [the girl]402-the girl is gone [he]826-that man will be like [the devil unchained]3076-the devil unchained . Then [you]72-almayer and [I]72-almayer had better beware . "[72-almayer] " [I]103-babalatchi am [an old man]3077-an old man and fear not death , "[103-babalatchi] answered [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , with a mendacious assumption of indifference . " But what will [you]103-babalatchi do ? "[103-babalatchi] " [I]72-almayer am [an old woman]3078-an old woman , and wish to live , "[72-almayer] retorted [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer . " [She]402-the girl is [[my]72-almayer daughter]2594-my daughter also . [I]72-almayer shall seek safety at the feet of [[our]2015-their Rajah]2683-our rajah , speaking in the name of the past when [we]2015-their both were young , and [he]2683-our rajah - "[72-almayer] [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi raised [his]103-babalatchi hand . " Enough . [You]402-the girl shall be protected , "[103-babalatchi] [he]103-babalatchi said soothingly . Again the sound of [Almayer]72-almayer 's voice was heard , and again interrupting [their]2015-their talk , [they]2015-their listened to the confused but loud utterance coming in bursts of unequal strength , with unexpected pauses and noisy repetitions that made some words and sentences fall clear and distinct on [their]2015-their ears out of the meaningless jumble of excited shoutings emphasised by the thumping of [Almayer]72-almayer 's fist upon the table . On the short intervals of silence , the high complaining note of tumblers , standing close together and vibrating to the shock , lingered , growing fainter , till it leapt up again into tumultuous ringing , when a new idea started a new rush of words and brought down the heavy hand again . At last the quarrelsome shouting ceased , and the thin plaint of disturbed glass died away into reluctant quietude . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi and [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer had listened curiously , [their]2015-their bodies bent and [their]2015-their ears turned towards [the passage]1004-the passage . At every louder shout [they]2015-their nodded at [each other]1412-each other with a ridiculous affectation of scandalised propriety , and [they]2015-their remained in the same attitude for some time after the noise had ceased . " This is the devil of gin , "[72-almayer] whispered [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer . " Yes ; [he]2683-our rajah talks like that sometimes when there is [nobody]163-nobody to hear [him]2683-our rajah . "[72-almayer] " What does [he]2683-our rajah say ? "[103-babalatchi] inquired [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , eagerly . " [You]72-almayer ought to understand . "[103-babalatchi] " [I]72-almayer have forgotten [their]2015-their talk . A little [I]72-almayer understood . [He]2683-our rajah spoke without any respect of [the white ruler in [Batavia]21-batavia]3082-the white ruler in batavia , and of protection , and said [he]2683-our rajah had been wronged ; [he]2683-our rajah said that several times . More [I]72-almayer did not understand . Listen ! Again [he]2683-our rajah speaks ! "[72-almayer] " Tse ! tse ! tse ! "[103-babalatchi] clicked [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , trying to appear shocked , but with a joyous twinkle of [his]103-babalatchi solitary eye . " There will be great trouble between [those white men]3083-those white men . [I]103-babalatchi will go round now and see . [You]72-almayer tell [[your]72-almayer daughter]3084-your daughter that there is a sudden and a long journey before [her]3084-your daughter , with much glory and splendour at the end . And tell [her]3084-your daughter that [Dain]74-dain must go , or [he]74-dain must die , and that [he]74-dain will not go alone . "[103-babalatchi] " No , [he]74-dain will not go alone , "[72-almayer] slowly repeated [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , with a thoughtful air , as [she]72-almayer crept into [the passage]1004-the passage after seeing [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi disappear round the corner of [the house]169-the house . [The statesman of [Sambir]123-the rajah]1085-the statesman of sambir , under the impulse of vivid curiosity , made [his]1085-the statesman of sambir way quickly to the front of [the house]169-the house , but once there [he]1085-the statesman of sambir moved slowly and cautiously as [he]1085-the statesman of sambir crept step by step up the stairs of [the verandah]156-the verandah . On the highest step [he]1085-the statesman of sambir sat down quietly , [his]1085-the statesman of sambir feet on the steps below , ready for flight should [his]1085-the statesman of sambir presence prove unwelcome . [He]1085-the statesman of sambir felt pretty safe so . The table stood nearly endways to [him]1085-the statesman of sambir , and [he]1085-the statesman of sambir saw [Almayer]72-almayer 's back ; at [Nina]73-nina [he]1085-the statesman of sambir looked full face , and had a side view of [both officers]1886-both officers ; but of [the four persons sitting at the table]2024-the four persons sitting at the table only [Nina]73-nina and [the younger officer]2025-the younger officer noticed [his]1085-the statesman of sambir noiseless arrival . The momentary dropping of [Nina]73-nina 's eyelids acknowledged [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi 's presence ; [she]73-nina then spoke at once to [the young sub]1908-the young sub , who turned towards [her]73-nina with attentive alacrity , but [her]1908-the young sub gaze was fastened steadily on [[her]1908-the young sub father]408-her father 's face while [Almayer]72-almayer was speaking uproariously . " . . . disloyalty and unscrupulousness ! What have [you]3085-you ever done to make [me]72-almayer loyal ? [You]3085-you have no grip on [this country]3086-this country . [I]72-almayer had to take care of [myself]72-almayer , and when [I]72-almayer asked for protection [I]72-almayer was met with threats and contempt , and had Arab slander thrown in [my]72-almayer face . [I]72-almayer ! [a white man]242-a white man ! "[72-almayer] " Do n't be violent , [Almayer]72-almayer , "[1882-the lieutenant] remonstrated [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant ; " [I]1882-the lieutenant have heard all this already . "[1882-the lieutenant] " Then why do [you]3085-you talk to [me]1882-the lieutenant about scruples ? [I]1882-the lieutenant wanted money , and [I]1882-the lieutenant gave powder in exchange . How could [I]1882-the lieutenant know that [some of [[your]3085-you wretched men]3089-your wretched men]3088-some of your wretched men were going to be blown up ? [Scruples]142-scruples ! Pah ! "[1882-the lieutenant] [He]1882-the lieutenant groped unsteadily amongst the bottles , trying one after another , grumbling to [himself]1882-the lieutenant the while . " No more wine , "[1882-the lieutenant] [he]1882-the lieutenant muttered discontentedly . " [You]72-almayer have had enough , [Almayer]72-almayer , "[1882-the lieutenant] said [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant , as [he]1882-the lieutenant lighted a cigar . Still [we]3090-we had better get that business over , and then [we]3090-we shall have more drink . Come ! do n't look at [me]1882-the lieutenant like this . "[1882-the lieutenant] [Almayer]72-almayer was staring with stony eyes , [his]1882-the lieutenant trembling fingers fumbling about [his]1882-the lieutenant throat . "[1882-the lieutenant] " [I]1882-the lieutenant know , [I]1882-the lieutenant know , "[1882-the lieutenant] said [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant soothingly . " No ! " [The government]3093-the government is [a fool]2832-a fool , [I]72-almayer tell [you]1873-the officer . Heaps of gold . [He]3096-another one is - "[72-almayer] [He]2031-he checked [himself]2031-he with a feeble smile , and , making an unsuccessful attempt to pat [the officer]1873-the officer on the shoulder , knocked over a couple of empty bottles . " Personally [you]1873-the officer are [a fine fellow]3097-a fine fellow , "[2031-he] [he]2031-he said very distinctly , in a patronising manner . " [I]1882-the lieutenant do not know ; "[1882-the lieutenant] [he]1882-the lieutenant went on , speaking with some embarrassment , " whether [I]1882-the lieutenant have any right to ask [you]72-almayer anything , unless , perhaps , to withdraw from this painful scene , but [I]1882-the lieutenant feel that [I]1882-the lieutenant must - for [[your]72-almayer father]2814-your father 's good - suggest that [you]72-almayer should - [I]1882-the lieutenant mean if [you]72-almayer have any influence over [him]2814-your father [you]72-almayer ought to exert it now to make [him]2814-your father keep the promise [he]2814-your father gave [me]1882-the lieutenant before [he]2814-your father - before [he]2814-your father got into this state . " [I]1882-the lieutenant trust - "[1882-the lieutenant] [he]1882-the lieutenant began again . " What is the promise [you]1882-the lieutenant speak of ? " [I]73-nina hate the sight of [your]1873-the officer white faces . [I]73-nina hate the sound of [your]1873-the officer gentle voices . [I]73-nina hoped to live [here]2634-here without seeing any other white face but this , "[73-nina] [she]73-nina added in a gentler tone , touching lightly [[her]73-nina father]408-her father 's cheek . "[73-nina] [She]73-nina caught sight of [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi and ceased speaking suddenly , but [her]73-nina foot tapped the floor with rapid beats in a paroxysm of nervous restlessness . [The two officers]1913-the two officers stood close together looking on curiously . " What has happened ? What is the matter ? "[2055-the younger man] whispered [the younger man]2055-the younger man . " Do n't know , "[343-the other] answered [the other]343-the other , under [his]343-the other breath . " [One]3118-one is furious , and [the other]343-the other is drunk . Not so drunk , either . Queer , this . Look ! "[343-the other] [Almayer]72-almayer had risen , holding on to [[his]408-her father daughter]162-his daughter 's arm . There [he]408-her father pulled [himself]408-her father together , and stood very straight , breathing hard and glaring round angrily . " Are [the men]1044-the men ready ? " [Two men]348-two men , "[408-her father] [he]408-her father began again , speaking with difficulty . " That 's better , [Almayer]72-almayer , "[1873-the officer] said [the officer]1873-the officer encouragingly . " Where are [you]72-almayer going to ? There are only planks there . "[1873-the officer] " Grave ! "[72-almayer] roared [Almayer]72-almayer , struggling to get [himself]72-almayer free . " A hole in the ground . Do n't [you]1873-the officer understand ? [You]1873-the officer must be drunk . Let [me]72-almayer go ! Let go , [I]72-almayer tell [you]1873-the officer ! "[72-almayer] [He]2063-he tore away from [the officer]1873-the officer 's grasp , and reeled towards the planks where the body lay under its white cover ; then [he]2063-he turned round quickly , and faced [the semicircle of interested faces]2070-the semicircle of interested faces . The sun was sinking rapidly , throwing long shadows of [house]486-house and trees over [the courtyard]988-the courtyard , but the light lingered yet on [the river]170-the river , where the logs went drifting past in midstream , looking very distinct and black in the pale red glow . The trunks of the trees in [the forest]915-the forest on [the east bank]2075-the east bank were lost in gloom while their highest branches swayed gently in the departing sunlight . The air felt heavy and cold in the breeze , expiring in slight puffs that came over the water . [Almayer]72-almayer shivered as [he]2063-he made an effort to speak , and again with an uncertain gesture [he]2063-he seemed to free [his]2063-he throat from the grip of an invisible hand . [His]2063-he bloodshot eyes wandered aimlessly from face to face . " There ! "[2063-he] [he]2063-he said at last . " Are [you]1873-the officer all there ? [He]2063-he is [a dangerous man]3135-a dangerous man . "[2063-he] [He]2063-he dragged at the cover with hasty violence , and the body rolled stiffly off the planks and fell at [his]2063-he feet in rigid helplessness . " Cold , perfectly cold , "[72-almayer] said [Almayer]72-almayer , looking round with a mirthless smile . " [Sorry]144-sorry can do no better . And [you]1873-the officer ca n't hang [him]2063-he , either . As [you]1873-the officer observe , [gentlemen]2956-gentlemen , "[2063-he] [he]2063-he added gravely , " there is no head , and hardly any neck . "[2063-he] The last ray of light was snatched away from the tree - tops , [the river]170-the river grew suddenly dark , and in the great stillness the murmur of the flowing water seemed to fill the vast expanse of grey shadow that descended upon [the land]1586-the land . " This is [Dain]74-dain , "[2063-he] went on [Almayer]72-almayer to [the silent group that surrounded [him]2063-he]2078-the silent group that surrounded him . " And [I]2063-he have kept [my]2063-he word . First one hope , then another , and this is [my]2063-he last . Nothing is left now . [You]1873-the officer think there is [one dead man here]3137-one dead man here ? Mistake , [I]2063-he ' sure [you]1873-the officer . [I]2063-he am much more dead . Why do n't [you]1873-the officer hang [me]2063-he ? "[2063-he] [he]2063-he suggested suddenly , in a friendly tone , addressing [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant . " [I]2063-he assure , assure [you]1873-the officer it would be a mat - matter of form altog - altogether . "[2063-he] These last words [he]2063-he muttered to [himself]2063-he , and walked zigzaging towards [[his]2063-he house]372-his house . " Get out ! "[2063-he] [he]2063-he thundered at [Ali]95-ali , who was approaching timidly with offers of assistance . From afar , [scared groups of [men]304-men and [women]631-women]2081-scared groups of men and women watched [his]2063-he devious progress . [He]2063-he dragged [himself]2063-he up the stairs by the banister , and managed to reach a chair into which [he]2063-he fell heavily . [He]2063-he sat for awhile panting with exertion and anger , and looking round vaguely for [Nina]73-nina ; then making a threatening gesture towards [the compound]573-the compound , where [he]2063-he had heard [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi 's voice , [he]2063-he overturned the table with [his]2063-he foot in a great crash of smashed crockery . [He]2063-he muttered yet menacingly to [himself]2063-he , then [his]2063-he head fell on [his]2063-he breast , [his]2063-he eyes closed , and with a deep sigh [he]2063-he fell asleep . That night - for the first time in [its]2085-its history - [the peaceful and flourishing settlement of [Sambir]123-the rajah]2086-the peaceful and flourishing settlement of sambir saw the lights shining about " [[Almayer]72-almayer 's Folly]3138-almayer 's folly . "[123-the rajah] These were the lanterns of [the boats]693-the boats hung up by [the seamen under the verandah]2088-the seamen under the verandah where [the two officers]1913-the two officers were holding a court of inquiry into the truth of the story related to [them]1913-the two officers by [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi had regained all [his]103-babalatchi importance . [He]103-babalatchi was eloquent and persuasive , calling Heaven and Earth to witness the truth of [his]103-babalatchi statements . There were also [other witnesses]2090-other witnesses . [Mahmat Banjer]132-mahmat and [a good many others]2091-a good many others underwent a close examination that dragged its weary length far into the evening . [A messenger]2092-a messenger was sent for [Abdulla]83-abdulla , who excused [himself]83-abdulla from coming on the score of [his]83-abdulla venerable age , but sent [Reshid]119-taminah . [Mahmat]132-mahmat had to produce the bangle , and saw with rage and mortification [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant put it in [his]1882-the lieutenant pocket , as one of the proofs of [Dain]74-dain 's death , to be sent in with the official report of the mission . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi 's ring was also impounded for the same purpose , but [the experienced statesman]2094-the experienced statesman was resigned to that loss from the very beginning . [He]2094-the experienced statesman did not mind as long as [he]2094-the experienced statesman was sure , that [the white men]2919-the white men believed . [He]2094-the experienced statesman put that question to [himself]2094-the experienced statesman earnestly as [he]2094-the experienced statesman left , one of the last , when the proceedings came to a close . [He]2094-the experienced statesman was not certain . Still , if [they]2919-the white men believed only for a night , [he]2094-the experienced statesman would put [Dain]74-dain beyond [their]2919-the white men reach and feel safe [himself]2094-the experienced statesman . [He]2094-the experienced statesman walked away fast , looking from time to time over [his]2094-the experienced statesman shoulder in the fear of being followed , but [he]2094-the experienced statesman saw and heard nothing . " Ten o'clock , "[1882-the lieutenant] said [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant , looking at [his]1882-the lieutenant watch and yawning . " [I]1882-the lieutenant shall hear some of [the captain]611-the captain 's complimentary remarks when [we]3140-we get back . Miserable business , this . "[1882-the lieutenant] " Do [you]2055-the younger man think all this is true ? "[2055-the younger man] asked [the younger man]2055-the younger man . " True ! It is just possible . But if it is n't true what can [we]3140-we do ? If [we]3140-we had [a dozen boats]3141-a dozen boats [we]3140-we could patrol [the creeks]3142-the creeks ; and that would n't be much good . [That drunken madman]3143-that drunken madman was right ; [we]3140-we have n't enough hold on [this coast]164-this coast . [They]3143-that drunken madman do what [they]3143-that drunken madman like . Are [our]3140-we hammocks slung ? "[2055-the younger man] " Yes , [I]2098-the sub told [the coxswain]3145-the coxswain . [Strange couple]3146-strange couple over there , "[2098-the sub] said [the sub]2098-the sub , with a wave of [his]2098-the sub hand towards [[Almayer]72-almayer 's house]524-almayer 's house . " [Hem]143-hem ! [Queer]3147-queer , certainly . What have [you]2098-the sub been telling [her]72-almayer ? [I]2098-the sub was attending to [the father]184-the father most of the time . "[2098-the sub] " [I]2100-the other warmly assure [you]2098-the sub [I]2100-the other warmly have been perfectly civil , "[2100-the other warmly] protested [the other warmly]2100-the other warmly . " All right . Do n't get excited . [She]72-almayer objects to civility , then , from what [I]2100-the other warmly understand . [I]2100-the other warmly thought [you]2098-the sub might have been tender . [You]2098-the sub know [we]2101-we are on service . "[2100-the other warmly] " Well , of course . Never forget that . Coldly civil . That 's all . "[2101-we] [They]2101-we both laughed a little , and not feeling sleepy began to pace [the verandah]156-the verandah side by side . The moon rose stealthily above the trees , and suddenly changed [the river]170-the river into a stream of scintillating silver . [The forest]915-the forest came out of the black void and stood sombre and pensive over [the sparkling water]2105-the sparkling water . The breeze died away into a breathless calm . Seamanlike , [the two officers]1913-the two officers tramped measuredly up and down without exchanging a word . The loose planks rattled rhythmically under [their]1913-the two officers steps with obstrusive dry sound in the perfect silence of the night . As [they]1913-the two officers were wheeling round again [the younger man]2055-the younger man stood attentive . " Did [you]343-the other hear that ? "[2055-the younger man] [he]2055-the younger man asked . " No ! "[343-the other] said [the other]343-the other . " Hear what ? "[343-the other] " [I]1882-the lieutenant thought [I]1882-the lieutenant heard a cry . Ever so faint . Seemed [a woman]613-a woman 's voice . In [that other house]3150-that other house . Ah ! Again ! Hear it ? "[1882-the lieutenant] " No , "[1882-the lieutenant] said [the lieutenant]1882-the lieutenant , after listening awhile . " [[You]343-the other young fellows]3151-you young fellows always hear [women]631-women 's voices . If [you]343-the other are going to dream [you]343-the other had better get into [your]343-the other hammock . Good - night . "[1882-the lieutenant] The moon mounted higher , and the warm shadows grew smaller and crept away as if hiding before the cold and cruel light . CHAPTER X. " It has set at last , "[73-nina] said [Nina]73-nina to [[her]73-nina mother]637-her mother pointing towards the hills behind which the sun had sunk . " Listen , [mother]2710-mother , [I]73-nina am going now to [[Bulangi]102-bulangi 's creek]1192-bulangi 's creek , and if [I]73-nina should never return - "[73-nina] [She]73-nina interrupted [herself]73-nina , and something like doubt dimmed for a moment the fire of suppressed exaltation that had glowed in [her]73-nina eyes and had illuminated the serene impassiveness of [her]73-nina features with a ray of eager life during all that long day of excitement - the day of joy and anxiety , of hope and terror , of vague grief and indistinct delight . While the sun shone with that dazzling light in which [her]73-nina love was born and grew till it possessed [her]73-nina whole being , [she]73-nina was kept firm in [her]73-nina unwavering resolve by the mysterious whisperings of desire which filled [her]73-nina heart with impatient longing for the darkness that would mean the end of danger and strife , the beginning of happiness , the fulfilling of love , the completeness of life . It had set at last ! The short tropical twilight went out before [she]73-nina could draw the long breath of relief ; and now the sudden darkness seemed to be full of menacing voices calling upon [her]73-nina to rush headlong into [the unknown]478-the unknown ; to be true to [her]73-nina own impulses , to give [herself]73-nina up to the passion [she]73-nina had evoked and shared . [He]2112-he was waiting ! In the solitude of [the secluded clearing]2113-the secluded clearing , in the vast silence of [the forest]915-the forest [he]2112-he was waiting alone , [a fugitive in fear of [his]2112-he life]2115-a fugitive in fear of his life . Indifferent to [his]2112-he danger [he]2112-he was waiting for [her]73-nina . It was for [her]73-nina only that [he]2112-he had come ; and now as the time approached when [he]2112-he should have [his]2112-he reward , [she]73-nina asked [herself]73-nina with dismay what meant that chilling doubt of [her]73-nina own will and of [her]73-nina own desire ? With an effort [she]73-nina shook off the fear of the passing weakness . [He]2112-he should have [his]2112-he reward . [[Her]73-nina woman]2116-her woman 's love and [[her]73-nina woman]2116-her woman 's honour overcame the faltering distrust of that unknown future waiting for [her]73-nina in the darkness of [the river]170-the river . " No , [you]2112-he will not return , "[72-almayer] muttered [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , prophetically . " Without [you]2112-he [he]2112-he will not go , and if [he]2112-he remains here - "[73-nina] [She]73-nina waved [her]73-nina hand towards the lights of " [[Almayer]72-almayer 's Folly]3138-almayer 's folly , "[73-nina] and the unfinished sentence died out in a threatening murmur . [The two women]1007-the two women had met behind [the house]169-the house , and now were walking slowly together towards [the creek]941-the creek where [all the canoes]2122-all the canoes were moored . Arrived at [the fringe of bushes]2123-the fringe of bushes [they]1007-the two women stopped by a common impulse , and [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , laying [her]72-almayer hand on [[her]72-almayer daughter]1005-her daughter 's arm , tried in vain to look close into [the girl]402-the girl 's averted face . When [she]73-nina attempted to speak [her]73-nina first words were lost in a stifled sob that sounded strangely coming from [that woman who , of all human passions , seemed to know only those of anger and hate]2126-that woman who , of all human passions , seemed to know only those of anger and hate . " [You]402-the girl are going away to be [a great Ranee]2765-a great ranee , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer said at last , in a voice that was steady enough now , " and if [you]402-the girl be wise [you]402-the girl shall have much power that will endure many days , and even last into [your]402-the girl old age . What have [I]72-almayer been ? [A slave]310-a slave all [my]72-almayer life , and [I]72-almayer have cooked rice for [a man who had no courage and no wisdom]3158-a man who had no courage and no wisdom . [Hai]141-hai ! [I]72-almayer ! even [I]72-almayer , was given in gift by [a chief]3159-a chief and [a warrior]3160-a warrior to [a man that was neither . Hai]3161-a man that was neither . hai ! [Hai]141-hai ! "[72-almayer] [She]73-nina wailed to [herself]73-nina softly , lamenting the lost possibilities of murder and mischief that could have fallen to [her]73-nina lot had [she]73-nina been mated with a congenial spirit . [Nina]73-nina bent down over [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer 's slight form and scanned attentively , under the stars that had rushed out on the black sky and now hung breathless over that strange parting , [[her]73-nina mother]637-her mother 's shrivelled features , and looked close into the sunken eyes that could see into [her]73-nina own dark future by the light of a long and a painful experience . Again [she]73-nina felt [herself]73-nina fascinated , as of old , by [[her]73-nina mother]637-her mother 's exalted mood and by the oracular certainty of expression which , together with [her]637-her mother fits of violence , had contributed not a little to the reputation for witchcraft [she]637-her mother enjoyed in [the settlement]523-the settlement . " [I]72-almayer was [a slave]310-a slave , and [you]73-nina shall be [a queen]3163-a queen , "[72-almayer] went on [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , looking straight before [her]73-nina ; " but remember [men]304-men 's strength and [their]304-men weakness . Tremble before [his]304-men anger , so that [he]304-men may see [your]73-nina fear in the light of day ; but in [your]73-nina heart [you]73-nina may laugh , for after sunset [he]304-men is [[your]73-nina slave]3056-your slave . "[72-almayer] " [A slave]310-a slave ! [He]304-men ! [The master of life]3167-the master of life ! [You]72-almayer do not know [him]304-men , [mother]2710-mother . "[72-almayer] [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer condescended to laugh contemptuously . " [You]72-almayer speak like [a fool]2832-a fool of [a white woman]3006-a white woman , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer exclaimed . " What do [you]72-almayer know of [men]304-men 's anger and of [men]304-men 's love ? Have [you]72-almayer watched the sleep of [men weary of dealing death]3173-men weary of dealing death ? Have [you]72-almayer felt about [you]72-almayer the strong arm that could drive a kriss deep into a beating heart ? [Yah]3174-yah ! [you]72-almayer are [a white woman]3006-a white woman , and ought to pray to [a woman - god]3176-a woman - god ! "[72-almayer] " Why do [you]72-almayer say this ? [I]72-almayer have listened to [your]72-almayer words so long that [I]72-almayer have forgotten [my]72-almayer old life . If [I]72-almayer was white would [I]72-almayer stand here , ready to go ? [Mother]145-mother , [I]72-almayer shall return to [the house]169-the house and look once more at [[my]72-almayer father]3178-my father 's face . "[72-almayer] " No ! "[72-almayer] said [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , violently . " No , [he]3178-my father sleeps now the sleep of gin ; and if [you]72-almayer went back [he]3178-my father might awake and see [you]72-almayer . No , [he]3178-my father shall never see [you]72-almayer . When [the terrible old man]451-the terrible old man took [you]72-almayer away from [me]72-almayer when [you]72-almayer were little , [you]72-almayer remember - "[72-almayer] " It was such a long time ago , "[73-nina] murmured [Nina]73-nina . " [I]72-almayer remember , "[72-almayer] went on [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , fiercely . " [I]72-almayer wanted to look at [your]72-almayer face again . [He]3178-my father said no ! [I]72-almayer heard [you]72-almayer cry and jumped into [the river]170-the river . [You]72-almayer were [[his]3178-my father daughter]162-his daughter then ; [you]72-almayer are [[my]72-almayer daughter]2594-my daughter now . Never shall [you]72-almayer go back to [that house]1969-that house ; [you]72-almayer shall never cross [this courtyard]3184-this courtyard again . No ! no ! "[72-almayer] [Her]72-almayer voice rose almost to a shout . On [the other side of [the creek]941-the creek]2130-the other side of the creek there was a rustle in the long grass . [The two women]1007-the two women heard it , and listened for a while in startled silence . " [I]73-nina shall go , "[73-nina] said [Nina]73-nina , in a cautious but intense whisper . " What is [your]72-almayer hate or [your]72-almayer revenge to [me]72-almayer ? "[72-almayer] [She]72-almayer moved towards [the house]169-the house , [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer clinging to [her]72-almayer and trying to pull [her]72-almayer back . " Stop , [you]72-almayer shall not go ! "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer gasped . [Nina]73-nina pushed away [[her]73-nina mother]637-her mother impatiently and gathered up [her]73-nina skirts for a quick run , but [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer ran forward and turned round , facing [[her]72-almayer daughter]1005-her daughter with outstretched arms . " If [you]72-almayer move another step , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer exclaimed , breathing quickly , " [I]72-almayer shall cry out . Do [you]72-almayer see those lights in [the big house]3185-the big house ? There sit [two white men]3109-two white men , angry because [they]3109-two white men can not have the blood of [the man [you]72-almayer love]3187-the man you love . And in [those dark houses]3188-those dark houses , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer continued , more calmly as [she]72-almayer pointed towards [the settlement]523-the settlement , " [my]72-almayer voice could wake up [men that would lead [the Orang Blanda soldiers]3190-the orang blanda soldiers to [him]3187-the man you love who is waiting - for [you]72-almayer]3189-men that would lead the orang blanda soldiers to him who is waiting - for you . "[72-almayer] [She]72-almayer could not see [[her]72-almayer daughter]1005-her daughter 's face , but [the white figure before [her]72-almayer]2138-the white figure before her stood silent and irresolute in the darkness . [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer pursued [her]72-almayer advantage . " Give up [your]72-almayer old life ! Forget ! "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer said in entreating tones . " Forget that [you]72-almayer ever looked at a white face ; forget [their]3191-their words ; forget [their]3191-their thoughts . [They]3191-their speak lies . And [they]3191-their think lies because [they]3191-their despise [us]3192-us that are better than [they]3191-their are , but not so strong . Forget [their]3191-their friendship and [their]3191-their contempt ; forget [their]3191-their many gods . [Girl]2714-girl , why do [you]72-almayer want to remember the past when there is [a warrior]3160-a warrior and [a chief ready to give many lives]3195-a chief ready to give many lives - [his]3160-a warrior own life - for one of [your]72-almayer smiles ? "[72-almayer] While [she]72-almayer spoke [she]72-almayer pushed gently [[her]72-almayer daughter]1005-her daughter towards the canoes , hiding [her]72-almayer own fear , anxiety , and doubt under the flood of passionate words that left [Nina]73-nina no time to think and no opportunity to protest , even if [she]73-nina had wished it . But [she]73-nina did not wish it now . At the bottom of that passing desire to look again at [[her]73-nina father]408-her father 's face there was no strong affection . [She]73-nina felt no scruples and no remorse at leaving suddenly [that man whose sentiment towards [herself]73-nina [she]73-nina could not understand , [she]73-nina could not even see]2141-that man whose sentiment towards herself she could not understand , she could not even see . There was only an instinctive clinging to old life , to old habits , to old faces ; that fear of finality which lurks in every human breast and prevents so many heroisms and so many crimes . For years [she]73-nina had stood between [[her]73-nina mother]637-her mother and [[her]73-nina father]408-her father , [the one so strong in [her]637-her mother weakness]2144-the one so strong in her weakness , the other so weak where [he]408-her father could have been strong . Between [those two beings]2145-those two beings so dissimilar , so antagonistic , [she]73-nina stood with mute heart wondering and angry at the fact of [her]73-nina own existence . It seemed so unreasonable , so humiliating to be flung there in [that settlement]2146-that settlement and to see the days rush by into the past , without a hope , a desire , or an aim that would justify the life [she]73-nina had to endure in ever - growing weariness . [She]73-nina had little belief and no sympathy for [[her]73-nina father]408-her father 's dreams ; but the savage ravings of [[her]73-nina mother]637-her mother chanced to strike a responsive chord , deep down somewhere in [her]73-nina despairing heart ; and [she]73-nina dreamed dreams of [her]73-nina own with the persistent absorption of a captive thinking of liberty within the walls of [[his]408-her father prison cell]2149-his prison cell . With the coming of [Dain]74-dain [she]73-nina found the road to freedom by obeying the voice of the new - born impulses , and with surprised joy [she]73-nina thought [she]73-nina could read in [his]408-her father eyes the answer to all the questionings of [her]73-nina heart . [She]73-nina understood now the reason and the aim of life ; and in the triumphant unveiling of that mystery [she]73-nina threw away disdainfully [her]73-nina past with its sad thoughts , its bitter feelings , and its faint affections , now withered and dead in contact with [her]73-nina fierce passion . [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer unmoored [Nina]73-nina 's own canoe and , straightening [herself]72-almayer painfully , stood , painter in hand , looking at [[her]72-almayer daughter]1005-her daughter . " Quick , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer said ; " get away before the moon rises , while [the river]170-the river is dark . [I]72-almayer am afraid of [[Abdulla]83-abdulla 's slaves]3197-abdulla 's slaves . The wretches prowl in the night often , and might see and follow [you]1005-her daughter . There are two paddles in [the canoe]338-the canoe . "[72-almayer] [Nina]73-nina approached [[her]73-nina mother]637-her mother and hesitatingly touched lightly with [her]73-nina lips the wrinkled forehead . [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer snorted contemptuously in protest against that tenderness which [she]72-almayer , nevertheless , feared could be contagious . " Shall [I]73-nina ever see [you]637-her mother again , [mother]2710-mother ? "[73-nina] murmured [Nina]73-nina . " No , "[72-almayer] said [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , after a short silence . " Why should [you]1005-her daughter return here where it is [my]72-almayer fate to die ? [You]1005-her daughter will live far away in splendour and might . When [I]72-almayer hear of [white men]471-white men driven from [the islands]217-the islands , then [I]72-almayer shall know that [you]1005-her daughter are alive , and that [you]1005-her daughter remember [my]72-almayer words . "[72-almayer] " [I]73-nina shall always remember , "[73-nina] returned [Nina]73-nina , earnestly ; " but where is [my]73-nina power , and what can [I]73-nina do ? "[73-nina] " Do not let [him]471-white men look too long in [your]1005-her daughter eyes , nor lay [his]471-white men head on [your]1005-her daughter knees without reminding [him]471-white men that [men]304-men should fight before [they]304-men rest . And if [he]471-white men lingers , give [him]471-white men [his]471-white men kriss [yourself]1005-her daughter and bid [him]471-white men go , as [the wife of a mighty prince]3203-the wife of a mighty prince should do when [the enemies]3204-the enemies are near . Let [him]471-white men slay [the white men that come to [us]3206-us to trade , with prayers on [their]3205-the white men that come to us to trade , with prayers on their lips and loaded guns in their hands lips and loaded guns in [their]3205-the white men that come to us to trade , with prayers on their lips and loaded guns in their hands hands]3205-the white men that come to us to trade , with prayers on their lips and loaded guns in their hands . Ah ! "[2152-she] - [she]2152-she ended with a sigh - " [they]3205-the white men that come to us to trade , with prayers on their lips and loaded guns in their hands are on [every sea]3207-every sea , and on [every shore]3208-every shore ; and [they]3205-the white men that come to us to trade , with prayers on their lips and loaded guns in their hands are very many ! "[2152-she] [She]2152-she swung the bow of [the canoe]338-the canoe towards [the river]170-the river , but did not let go the gunwale , keeping [her]2152-she hand on it in irresolute thoughtfulness . [Nina]73-nina put the point of the paddle against the bank , ready to shove off into [the stream]1985-the stream . " What is it , [mother]2710-mother ? "[73-nina] [she]73-nina asked , in a low voice . " Do [you]2710-mother hear anything ? "[73-nina] " No , "[72-almayer] said [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , absently . " Listen , [Nina]73-nina , "[2152-she] [she]2152-she continued , abruptly , after a slight pause , " in after years there will be [other women]3210-other women - "[2152-she] A stifled cry in [the boat]336-the boat interrupted [her]2152-she , and the paddle rattled in the canoe as it slipped from [Nina]73-nina 's hands , which [she]2152-she put out in a protesting gesture . [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer fell on [her]72-almayer knees on [the bank]331-the bank and leaned over the gunwale so as to bring [her]72-almayer own face close to [[her]72-almayer daughter]1005-her daughter 's . " There will be [other women]3210-other women , "[2152-she] [she]2152-she repeated firmly ; " [I]2152-she tell [you]73-nina that , because [you]73-nina are half white , and may forget that [he]3212-he is [a great chief]1270-a great chief , and that such things must be . Hide [your]73-nina anger , and do not let [him]3212-he see on [your]73-nina face the pain that will eat [your]73-nina heart . Meet [him]3212-he with joy in [your]73-nina eyes and wisdom on [your]73-nina lips , for to [you]73-nina [he]3212-he will turn in sadness or in doubt . As long as [he]3212-he looks upon [many women]3214-many women [your]73-nina power will last , but should there be one , one only with whom [he]3212-he seems to forget [you]73-nina , then - "[2152-she] " [I]73-nina could not live , "[73-nina] exclaimed [Nina]73-nina , covering [her]73-nina face with both [her]73-nina hands . " Do not speak so , [mother]2710-mother ; it could not be . "[73-nina] " Then , "[72-almayer] went on [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , steadily , " to [that woman]1815-that woman , [Nina]73-nina , show no mercy . "[72-almayer] [She]72-almayer moved [the canoe]338-the canoe down towards [the stream]1985-the stream by the gunwale , and gripped it with both [her]72-almayer hands , the bow pointing into [the river]170-the river . " Are [you]1005-her daughter crying ? "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer asked sternly of [[her]72-almayer daughter]1005-her daughter , who sat still with covered face . " Arise , and take [your]1005-her daughter paddle , for [he]3217-he has waited long enough . And remember , [Nina]73-nina , no mercy ; and if [you]1005-her daughter must strike , strike with a steady hand . "[72-almayer] [She]72-almayer put out all [her]72-almayer strength , and swinging [her]72-almayer body over the water , shot [the light craft]1233-the light craft far into [the stream]1985-the stream . When [she]72-almayer recovered [herself]72-almayer from the effort [she]72-almayer tried vainly to catch a glimpse of [the canoe]338-the canoe that seemed to have dissolved suddenly into the white mist trailing over [the heated waters of [the Pantai]3-the pantai]2166-the heated waters of the pantai . After listening for a while intently on [her]72-almayer knees , [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer rose with a deep sigh , while two tears wandered slowly down [her]72-almayer withered cheeks . [She]72-almayer wiped them off quickly with a wisp of [her]72-almayer grey hair as if ashamed of [herself]72-almayer , but could not stifle another loud sigh , for [her]72-almayer heart was heavy and [she]72-almayer suffered much , being unused to tender emotions . This time [she]72-almayer fancied [she]72-almayer had heard a faint noise , like the echo of [her]72-almayer own sigh , and [she]72-almayer stopped , straining [her]72-almayer ears to catch the slightest sound , and peering apprehensively towards the bushes near [her]72-almayer . " Who is there ? "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer asked , in an unsteady voice , while [her]72-almayer imagination peopled the solitude of [the riverside]648-the riverside with ghost - like forms . " Who is there ? "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer repeated faintly . There was no answer : only the voice of [the river]170-the river murmuring in sad monotone behind the white veil seemed to swell louder for a moment , to die away again in a soft whisper of eddies washing against [the bank]331-the bank . [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer shook [her]72-almayer head as if in answer to [her]72-almayer own thoughts , and walked quickly away from the bushes , looking to the right and left watchfully . [She]72-almayer went straight towards [the cooking - shed]2006-the cooking - shed , observing that the embers of the fire there glowed more brightly than usual , as if [somebody]1308-somebody had been adding fresh fuel to the fires during the evening . As [she]72-almayer approached , [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , who had been squatting in the warm glow , rose and met [her]72-almayer in the shadow outside . " Is [she]72-almayer gone ? "[1427-the anxious statesman] asked [the anxious statesman]1427-the anxious statesman , hastily . " Yes , "[72-almayer] answered [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer . " What are [the white men]2919-the white men doing ? When did [you]103-babalatchi leave [them]2919-the white men ? "[72-almayer] " [They]2919-the white men are sleeping now , [I]103-babalatchi think . May [they]2919-the white men never wake ! "[103-babalatchi] exclaimed [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , fervently . " Oh ! but [they]2919-the white men are [devils]3219-devils , and made much talk and trouble over [that carcase]3220-that carcase . [The chief]1874-the chief threatened [me]103-babalatchi twice with [his]1874-the chief hand , and said [he]1874-the chief would have [me]103-babalatchi tied up to a tree . Tie [me]103-babalatchi up to a tree ! [Me]103-babalatchi ! "[103-babalatchi] [he]103-babalatchi repeated , striking [his]103-babalatchi breast violently . [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer laughed tauntingly . " And [you]103-babalatchi salaamed and asked for mercy . Men with arms by [their]2919-the white men side acted otherwise when [I]72-almayer was young . "[72-almayer] " And where are [they]2919-the white men , [the men of [your]72-almayer youth]3222-the men of your youth ? [[You]72-almayer mad woman]3223-you mad woman ! "[103-babalatchi] retorted [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , angrily . " Killed by [the Dutch]124-the dutch . Aha ! But [I]103-babalatchi shall live to deceive [them]2919-the white men . [A man]340-a man knows when to fight and when to tell peaceful lies . [You]72-almayer would know that if [you]72-almayer were not [a woman]613-a woman . "[103-babalatchi] But [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer did not seem to hear [him]103-babalatchi . With bent body and outstretched arm [she]72-almayer appeared to be listening to some noise behind [the shed]2173-the shed . " There are strange sounds , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer whispered , with evident alarm . " [I]72-almayer have heard in the air the sounds of grief , as of a sigh and weeping . That was by [the riverside]648-the riverside . And now again [I]72-almayer heard - "[72-almayer] " Where ? "[103-babalatchi] asked [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi , in an altered voice . " What did [you]103-babalatchi hear ? "[103-babalatchi] " Close here . It was like a breath long drawn . [I]72-almayer wish [I]72-almayer had burnt the paper over the body before it was buried . "[72-almayer] " Yes , "[103-babalatchi] assented [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " But [the white men]2919-the white men had [him]103-babalatchi thrown into a hole at once . [You]72-almayer know [he]103-babalatchi found [his]103-babalatchi death on [the river]170-the river , "[103-babalatchi] [he]103-babalatchi added cheerfully , " and [his]103-babalatchi ghost may hail the canoes , but would leave [the land]1586-the land alone . "[103-babalatchi] [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer , who had been craning [her]72-almayer neck to look round the corner of [the shed]2173-the shed , drew back [her]72-almayer head . " There is [nobody there]3230-nobody there , "[72-almayer] [she]72-almayer said , reassured . " Is it not time for [the Rajah war - canoe]3231-the rajah war - canoe to go to [the clearing]1416-the clearing ? "[72-almayer] " [I]103-babalatchi have been waiting for it [here]2634-here , for [I]103-babalatchi [myself]103-babalatchi must go , "[103-babalatchi] explained [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi . " [I]103-babalatchi think [I]103-babalatchi will go over and see what makes [them]2175-them late . When will [you]103-babalatchi come ? [The Rajah]123-the rajah gives [you]103-babalatchi refuge . "[103-babalatchi] " [I]72-almayer shall paddle over before the break of day . [I]72-almayer can not leave [my]72-almayer dollars behind , "[72-almayer] muttered [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer . [They]2175-them separated . [Babalatchi]103-babalatchi crossed [the courtyard]988-the courtyard towards [the creek]941-the creek to get [[his]103-babalatchi canoe]1217-his canoe , and [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer walked slowly to [the house]169-the house , ascended the plankway , and passing through [the back verandah]2180-the back verandah entered [the passage leading to the front of [the house]169-the house]2181-the passage leading to the front of the house ; but before going in [she]72-almayer turned in the doorway and looked back at [the empty and silent courtyard]2183-the empty and silent courtyard , now lit up by the rays of the rising moon . No sooner [she]72-almayer had disappeared , however , than a vague shape flitted out from amongst the stalks of [the banana plantation]990-the banana plantation , darted over [the moonlit space]2185-the moonlit space , and fell in the darkness at the foot of [the verandah]156-the verandah . It might have been the shadow of a driving cloud , so noiseless and rapid was its passage , but for the trail of disturbed grass , whose feathery heads trembled and swayed for a long time in the moonlight before they rested motionless and gleaming , like a design of silver sprays embroidered on a sombre background . [Mrs. Almayer]72-almayer lighted the cocoanut lamp , and lifting cautiously the red curtain , gazed upon [[her]72-almayer husband]571-her husband , shading the light with [her]72-almayer hand . [Almayer]72-almayer , huddled up in the chair , one of [his]571-her husband arms hanging down , the other thrown across the lower part of [his]571-her husband face as if to ward off [an invisible enemy]2188-an invisible enemy , [his]571-her husband legs stretched straight out , slept heavily , unconscious of the unfriendly eyes that looked upon [him]571-her husband in disparaging criticism .
